mapper.update: update basic_test_item set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, period = #{period,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sub_contract = #{subContract,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, com_name = #{comName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext1 = #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext2 = #{ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext3 = #{ext3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext4 = #{ext4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext5 = #{ext5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, price, period, quantity, sub_contract, com_name, ext1, ext2, ext3, ext4, ext5, remark from basic_test_item where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, name, price, period, quantity, sub_contract, com_name, ext1, ext2, ext3, ext4, ext5, remark from basic_test_item
